Header: 64 Div Troops Clear A-34 Road of Disruptions
Content: The A-34 road which runs through the 64 Division area under the Security Force Headquarters â€“ Mullaittivu turned fully impassable after gushing winds forced the fall of a huge tree recently blocking the passage of traffic in the general area of Oddusudan. On being informed of the disruptions, a team of 40 Army troops of the Division under the guidance of the General Officer Commanding, 64 Division rushed to the scene and attended to the emergency.  Soldiers within a few hours cleared the passage after chopping it into pieces and removing it.
